title: Naqoyqatsi: life as war
creator_credit: Godfrey Reggio, Lawrence Taub, Joe Beirne and Miramax Films
brief_description: The last of a trilogy that consists of “Koyaanisqatsi” (1982) and “Powaqqatsi” (1988) by Godfrey Reggio. In this instalment Reggio addresses the effect that technology has on our lives and the detrimental impact of advertising, media and technology to create a life out of balance. Music score by Phillip Glass. Director Steven Soderbergh served as executive producer.
